content: next 2 sts this will help hide the colors changes then continue on to the body body round 1 single_crochet in next 10 sts of the first leg single_crochet in next 10 sts of the second leg 20 sts place a stitch marker in the first stitch made in the first leg this is now the first stitch of the round round 2-5 single_crochet in each st 4 rounds round 6 single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 times 18 sts round 7 single_crochet in each st round 8 single_crochet in next 7 sts decrease 2 times 16 sts round 9 single_crochet in each st fasten_off using the invisible method leaving a long tail for seaming ©alyssa voznak 2024 pattern may not be resold or redistributed without permission items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities with credit given to me as the designer 6 llama lou crochet arms make 2 round 1 with color 2 single_crochet 6 in a magic_ring 6 sts round 2 single_crochet in each st switch to color 3 round 3-5 single_crochet in each st 3 rounds flatten the opening so that the stitches on both sides line up round 6 single_crochet 3 through both layers fasten_off with a long tail for seaming finishing with the fastened-off tail of the legs to close up the gap between them stuff the legs and the body attach the helmet to the opening of the body using the front loops of round 13 as a guide i prefer to go around the post of the stitch rather than use the front loop itself if necessary add more stuffing to the neck before closing attach the arms to either side of the body at round 8 attach the visor to the helmet between round 7-11 centered above the arms with a scrap of color 2 embroider a zipper by making two long stitches down the front of body and two buttons using cross stitches beside it congratulations on your finished astronaut ©alyssa voznak 2024 pattern may not be resold or redistributed without permission items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities with credit given to me as the designer
